Package dalserver

Implements the server side of the VO data access layer (DAL) interfaces.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DateParser Date parser for ISO 8601 format.
HashCodeUtil Collected methods which allow easy implementation of hashCode.
KeywordFactory KeywordFactory implements a factory class for well-known DAL keywords, including Groups, Params and Fields.
Param The Param (parameter) class is used to store a runtime parameter instance, e.g., a GET/POST request parameter input to a DAL service.
ParamSet The ParamSet class implements a parameter set mechanism oriented toward service request parameters.
Range The Range class implements a single Range element, and is used to contruct range lists.
RangeList The RangeList class implements a multi-element, numeric or string, ordered or unordered range list object.
RequestParams The RequestParams class renders an HTTP GET/POST servlet request into a regularized parameter set.
RequestResponse The RequestResponse class is used to build a servlet request response object, which is then serialized and returned to the client to respond to a service request.
SpectrumKeywordFactory SpectrumKeywordFactory implements a factory class for the Spectrum data model keywords.
SsapKeywordData Raw data for the SSA and Spectrum data models (this class is autogenerated).
SsapKeywordFactory SsapKeywordFactory implements a factory class for well-known SSAP keywords, including Groups, Params and Fields.
SsapParamSet Construct an initial default parameter set containing the parameters for an SSAP service.
SsapService A generic class which implements the operations for a DALServer SSAP service.
SsapServlet Generic HTTP Servlet for the SSAP protocol (this is an actual working service but it never finds any data).
TableField The TableField class is used to represent a field of a table (or a field of a data model stored in a table).
TableGroup The TableGroup class is used to represent the Group construct of a table, that is, a construct which associates several Param, Field, or Group elements of a table as part of a higher level logical group or association.
TableInfo The TableInfo class is used to add an INFO element to a RequestResponse object (in the VOTable serialization the INFO will be written to the RESOURCE element, not to the table itself).
TableParam The TableParam class is used to represent a global parameter in a table, that is, a parameter which applies to the entire table.
 

Enum Summary
ParamLevel The level to which a parameter belongs, e.g., the scope or type of standard.
ParamType All defined parameter types.
RangeType All possible range element types.
 

Exception Summary
DalServerException Numeric and nonnumeric ranges cannot be mixed in the same range list.
InvalidDateException Numeric and nonnumeric ranges cannot be mixed in the same range list.
 

Package dalserver Description

Implements the server side of the VO data access layer (DAL) interfaces.

This package contains Java code for implementing IVOA Data Access Layer (DAL) services. The dalserver package provides two main top level externally-callable classes for use in writing DAL services: RequestParams, and RequestResponse. RequestParams is used to read an HTTP GET or POST request and render the request as a fully processed service parameter set (e.g., for a specific service such as SSAP). RequestResponse and the related dalserver classes are used to build the response to the request. The response is built up as a data model in memory and subsequently serialized, for example as a VOTable, to respond to the request.

The "business logic" for the service (the part which differs locally) is responsible for reading the local DBMS or data collection, and computing the metadata which will be returned in response to the request. For example, in the case of SSAP, the service should subclass the SsapService class to provide these functions for the local environment. This class is then used in the SsapServlet class to build a servlet implementing the service.

Package Specification

  • Simple Spectral Access protocol
  • Simple Image Access protocol

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • IVOA Data Access Layer TWiki
